title: Number of Burgers with No Waste of Ingredients
content: Given two integers and . The ingredients of different burgers are as follows: Jumbo Burger: 4 tomato slices and 1 cheese slice. Small Burger: 2 Tomato slices and 1 cheese slice. Return so that the number of remaining equal to 0 and the number of remaining equal to 0. If it is not possible to make the remaining and equal to 0 return .
